title: Repository missing standardized CLAUDE.md project instructions
recommendation: Add a project-level CLAUDE.md with build commands, test instructions, and architecture notes to improve onboarding and AI-assisted development consistency.

title: AGENTS.md centralizes a long manually curated skill registry

evidence.snippet: ### Available skills ... - OSS Contributor ... - web-interface-guidelines ... - skill-installer

recommendation: Split the skill registry into smaller include files (or generate it from a source directory) to reduce manual editing overhead and drift risk.

title: Project root contains multiple loosely organized documentation files
recommendation: Consolidate root-level documentation files (e.g., adapter-contract-tests.md, capability-probe-spec.md, dry-run-plan.md) into the 'docs/' directory to maintain a clean project structure.

title: 项目根目录缺少README文档，降低可维护性

evidence.snippet: README.md not found in project root

recommendation: 在项目根目录新增README.md，至少包含项目简介、目录结构、安装步骤、运行方式与常见开发命令，以降低新成员上手成本并提升长期可维护性。

title: 缺少项目级文档索引

evidence.snippet: README.md 未包含完整的项目结构导航和模块关系说明

recommendation: 在 README.md 中添加项目目录结构概览和各模块职责说明
